SCTX - Script Source:
ScriptName mwItermerelScript


Begin OnPackageEnd fbmwMGEscortScholar2FollowNow
	SetStage fbmwMGEscortScholar2 70
	SET fbmwMGEscortScholar2.FollowNow TO 0
	fbItermerelREF.EvaluatePackage
END

Begin GameMode
	IF GetDistance fbmwMGEscortHalfwayMarker < 200
		SetStage fbmwMGEscortScholar2 70
	ENDIF

	IF fbmwMGEscortScholar2.FollowNow == 0 && GetQuestRunning fbmwMGEscortScholar2 && GetStage fbmwMGEscortScholar2 < 70
		fbItermerelREF.EvaluatePackage
	ENDIF
END
